text: Elections to Epping Forest Council were held on 2 May 2002. The whole council was up for election with boundary changes since the last election in 2000 reducing the number of seats by 1. The council stayed under no overall control. ==Election result== 1 Conservative candidate was unopposed. ==Ward results== ==References== *2002 Epping Forest election result *Ward results 2002 Category:2002 English local elections Category:2000s in Essex
title: 2002 Epping Forest District Council election
